languages.text: Каждому орудию соответствует свое действие атаки — активируйте панель атак с помощью {console_bind|Func01}. Затем выберите способность, которой хотите атаковать противника — вы увидите {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}сектор стрельбы{/g}.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.
languages.original_text: Каждому орудию соответствует свое действие атаки — активируйте панель атак с помощью {console_bind|Func01}. Затем выберите способность, которой хотите атаковать противника — вы увидите {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}сектор стрельбы{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each of the ship's weapons has its own attack action associated with it. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's firing arc will be displayed.

Each of the ship's weapons has its own attack action associated with it. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's firing arc will be displayed.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's firing arc will be displayed.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.

languages.text: Cada arma de la nave tiene una acción de ataque independiente. Puedes activar el panel de ataques con {console_bind|Func01}. Una vez eliges una capacidad con la que atacar al enemigo, se mostrará el {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arco de disparo{/g} del arma.
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.

traits.locale_text: Cada arma de la nave tiene una acción de ataque independiente. Puedes activar el panel de ataques con {console_bind|Func01}. Una vez eliges una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} con la que atacar al enemigo, se mostrará el {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arco de disparo{/g} del arma.

languages.text: 船の各武器には個別の攻撃アクションがある。{console_bind|Func01}を使用して、攻撃パネルを起動できる。敵を攻撃するアビリティを選択すると、武器の{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}射撃範囲{/g}が表示される。
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.

traits.locale_text: 船の各武器には個別の攻撃アクションがある。{console_bind|Func01}を使用して、攻撃パネルを起動できる。敵を攻撃する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を選択すると、武器の{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}発射アーク{/g}が表示される。

languages.text: 虚空舰每种武器都有单独的攻击操作。您可以通过{console_bind|Func01}来激活攻击面板。选择用来攻击敌人的能力之后，武器的{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}炮击弧线{/g}就会显示出来。
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰每种武器都有单独的攻击操作。您可以通过{console_bind|Func01}来激活攻击面板。选择用来攻击敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后，武器的{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}炮击弧线{/g}就会显示出来。

languages.text: Jede Waffe des Schiffes hat eine eigene Angriffsaktion. Du kannst das Panel für Angriffe mit {console_bind|Func01} aktivieren. Sobald du eine Fähigkeit ausgewählt hast, mit der du einen Gegner angreifen willst, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}Schusswinkel{/g} der Waffe angezeigt.
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.

traits.locale_text: Jede Waffe des Schiffes hat eine eigene Angriffsaktion. Du kannst das Panel für Angriffe mit {console_bind|Func01} aktivieren. Sobald du eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} ausgewählt hast, mit der du einen Gegner angreifen willst, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}Schusswinkel{/g} der Waffe angezeigt.

languages.text: Chaque arme du vaisseau présente une action d'attaque distincte. Vous pouvez activer le panneau des attaques avec {console_bind|Func01}. Après avoir sélectionné une capacité pour attaquer un ennemi, l'{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arc de tir{/g} de l'arme s'affiche.
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.

traits.locale_text: Chaque arme du vaisseau présente une action d'attaque distincte. Vous pouvez activer le panneau des attaques à l’aide de {console_bind|Func01}. Après avoir sélectionné une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pour attaquer un ennemi, l'{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arc de tir{/g} de l'arme s'affiche.

languages.text: Geminin silahlarından her birinin ayrı birer saldırı eylemi bulunur. {console_bind|Func01} ile saldırı panelini etkinleştirebilirsin. Saldırı yapacağın kabiliyeti seçtiğinde, silahın {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}atış yayı{/g} ekranda görüntülenir.
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action. You can activate the attacks panel using {console_bind|Func01}. Once you have selected an ability to attack an enemy with, the weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} will be displayed.
